phrases.phrase: Adds a border around a block of content.
Centers a section of content in a block that is as wide as you declare it to be.
Adds a height restriction to content.
This BBCode lets you create scroll boxes.
Creates a thin styled progress bar.

This BBCode allows users to insert Font Awesome icons in posts.
Extends the standard font tag with Google Fonts support.
Render the content for a single tab. This is not to be used directly.
